short_description: termodizayn is an industrial air solutions company based in istanbul, turkey.
long_description: soğuk hava depoları, split tip soğutma üniteleri ve soğuk su üreticilerini buradan inceleyebilirsiniz. mobil çözümler işinizi kolaylaştırmak için akıllı ve pratik tasarımlardır. i̇şimizi seviyoruz ve sevdiğimiz işi yapıyoruz. gelişen teknolojileri yakından takip ederek, en yenilikçi ürünleri sizlere sunuyoruz.
generated_description: termodizayn, legally known as termodizayn termik cihazlar san. and tic. ltd. ltd., based in esenyurt, istanbul, specializes in the production of ice machines, cold storage solutions, refrigeration systems, and container shock units. with over 37 years of experience, the company offers a wide range of products including solar-powered mobile cold storage units, sea water refrigeration devices, and various types of ice machines such as leaf ice machines, block ice machines, and tube ice machines. termodizayn also provides industrial refrigeration units, ultra-deep freezing units, and mobile blast chillers. the company is known for its innovative products and commitment to customer satisfaction.
